livewire

Class CostMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • livewire.CostMap

  • public class CostMap
extends java.lang.Object
    CostMap is used to calculate and store the cumulative costs of the image pixels from a given seedpoint. It uses a variation of Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm to expand the image pixel graph and calculate least cost paths from the seed point to all other pixels in the image.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CostMap.Node
      Used for the expansion algorithm to store cumulative costs and parent pointers

      • reset

      • addSeed

        public void addSeed(int row,
           int col)
        Sets a seedpoint as the starting point of the expansion algorithm. A call to this method triggers the expansion algorithm to run, generating cumulative costs and parents pointers.
        Parameters:
        row - the pixel row of the starting seedpoint
        col - the column of the starting seedpoint

      • getNode

        public CostMap.Node getNode(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.CvPoint point)
        Returns:
        the Node corresponding to the specified point in the image
